text: Hello, I'm trying to include images from a modules field group, the default image shows, but when I populate other images at the template level the image disappears. What variable can I use to get the images from the template.. Full disclosure: this is my practicum for certification; I am using my resources!
A little confused with your wording. Is your module setup with repeating fields so you can keep adding the images/titles?

from your screenshot it looks like only the image is set to be repeatable (as that is where the add button is and what looks to be a item of the repeater) so you might have issues with the text field being in the loop when they aren't part of that group.
